segment.source: Request Deployment of a GPO
segment.target: Request Deployment of a GPO

segment.source: Request Deployment of a GPO
segment.target: Request Deployment of a GPO

segment.source: Request Deployment of a GPO
segment.target: Request Deployment of a GPO

segment.source: After you have modified and checked in a Group Policy Object (GPO), deploy the GPO, so it will take effect in the production environment.
segment.target: After you have modified and checked in a Group Policy Object (GPO), deploy the GPO, so it will take effect in the production environment.

segment.source: A user account with the Editor role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Editor role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To request the deployment of a GPO to the production environment of the domain
segment.target: To request the deployment of a GPO to the production environment of the domain

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO to be deployed, and then click Deploy.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO to be deployed, and then click Deploy.

segment.source: Unless you are an Approver or AGPM Administrator or have special permission to deploy GPOs, you must submit a request for deployment.
segment.target: Unless you are an Approver or AGPM Administrator or have special permission to deploy GPOs, you must submit a request for deployment.

segment.source: To receive a copy of the request, type your e-mail address in the Cc field.
segment.target: To receive a copy of the request, type your e-mail address in the Cc field.

segment.source: Type a comment to be displayed in the History for the GPO, and then click Submit.
segment.target: Type a comment to be displayed in the History for the GPO, and then click Submit.

segment.source: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.
segment.target: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.

segment.source: The GPO is displayed on the list of GPOs on the Pending tab.
segment.target: The GPO is displayed on the list of GPOs on the Pending tab.

segment.source: When an Approver has approved your request, the GPO will be moved from the Pending tab to the Controlled tab and be deployed.
segment.target: When an Approver has approved your request, the GPO will be moved from the Pending tab to the Controlled tab and be deployed.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be an Editor to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Editor to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Edit Settings permissions for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Edit Settings permissions for the GPO.

segment.source: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.
segment.target: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO, and then click Withdraw.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO, and then click Withdraw.

segment.source: The GPO will be returned to the Controlled tab.
segment.target: The GPO will be returned to the Controlled tab.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Performing Editor Tasks
segment.target: Performing Editor Tasks
